text: Psalm 86
A Prayer for Help against Ruthless Men
A prayer of David.\f + \fr Ps 86 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm \f*
Incline, O Yahweh, your ear \add and\add* answer me,
because I \add am\add* poor and needy.
Watch over my life because I \add am\add* faithful.
You \add are\add* my God; save your servant.
\add I am\add* the one who trusts you.
Be gracious to me, O Lord,
because I call to you ⸤all day long⸥.\f + \fr 86:3 \ft Literally “all the day” \f*
Make glad the soul of your servant,
because ⸤I desire you⸥,\f + \fr 86:4 \ft Literally “I lift up my soul to you” \f* O Lord.
For you, O Lord, \add are\add* good and forgiving,
and abundant in loyal love\f + \fr 86:5 \ft Hebrew “and great with respect to loyal love” \f* for all who call to you.
Heed, O Yahweh, my prayer,
and attend to the voice of my supplications.
In the day of my trouble I call to you,
because you answer me.
There is none like you among the gods, O Lord,
and there are no works like yours.
All \add the\add* nations that you have made will come
and bow down\f + \fr 86:9 \ft Or “worship” \f* before you, O Lord,
and glorify your name.
For you \add are\add* great and doing wondrous things;
you alone \add are\add* God.
Teach me, O Yahweh, your way,
\add that\add* I may walk in your truth.
Unite my heart\f + \fr 86:11 \ft That is, give singleness of heart \f* to fear your name.
I will give you thanks, O Lord my God, with all my heart,
and glorify your name forever,
because your loyal love \add is\add* great toward me,
and you will have delivered my life from Sheol\f + \fr 86:13 \ft The nether world, the place of departed spirits. \f* below.
O God, arrogant men have risen up against me,
even a gang of ruthless men seek my life,
but they do not set you before them.\f + \fr 86:14 \ft That is, they do not factor God into their actions \f*
But you, O Lord, \add are\add* a compassionate and gracious God,
⸤slow to anger⸥\f + \fr 86:15 \ft Literally “long of nostrils” \f* and abundant in loyal love and faithfulness.
Turn to me and be gracious to me.
Give your strength to your servant,
and grant victory to the son\f + \fr 86:16 \ft Or “Save the son” \f* of your maidservant.
Do a sign \add that\add* benefits me,
that those who hate me may see and be put to shame,
because you, O Yahweh, have helped me and comforted me.
